data.actual_result: Gif picker button stays large and highlighted after being closed
data.expected_result: Gif picker button shrinks and darkens after gif picker is closed
data.short_description: Mousing off of and back onto the gif picker after opening doesn't de-select when clicked
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the emoji picker in a channel - Mouse off the button, and back onto the button - Click the button to close the emoji picker - Observe what the emoji picker button does - Open the gif picker - Mouse off the button, and back onto the button - Click the button to close the gif picker - Observe what happens to the gif picker button
